text: @ajbalaram agreed. By their logic, stay at home moms who make no income therefore have no right to have an opinion on tax policy. Furthermore, those who have never owned a gun or been hurt by one have no right to have a say in gun policy. It’s preposterous

People who say that are usually not logically consistent. This statement isn't addressing whether abortion is ethical or not it's just saying "even if it isn't it's none of your business". By that logic you shouldn't speak against school shooters and murders because it's none of your business. Or if someone is about to get shot you shouldn't do anything about it because it's none of your business and it doesn't affect you directly. I'm sorry for people who hold this position because they obviously believe that morality is just a matter of opinion
